name: Potli Pulao Recipe | Masala TV
ingredients: Ingredients for Potli Pulao Recipe: Beef 750 gm Rice 750 gm Onions 2 sliced Ginger garlic 2 tbsp Oil 1 cup Yogurt 1 cup Green chilies grinded 6 Green chilies whole 4
instructions: In a pan add 7 cups water, beef, ginger garlic paste, make a small pouch of muslin cloth. Add in 4 tbsp pulao masala, 1 onion sliced, cover and boil on low heat till beef tender. Then remove the beef from stock, measure stock and make up to 6 cups, sieve the stock, discard the pouch. Heat oil, fry onion golden, add boiled beef with stock. Add salt 1 tbsp, bring to boil, add in soaked rice, cover and cook till rice done. Leave it on dum, serve with raita.
